mapper.select:
select count(*) from calendar where 1=1 and delete_dt is null
and cal_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select cal.cal_no as calNo, cal.cal_nm as calNm, cal.cal_content as calContent, cal.cal_start as calStart, cal.cal_end as calEnd, cal.cal_stf_no as calStfNo, DATE_FORMAT(bs.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDt, DATE_FORMAT(bs.update_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDt, DATE_FORMAT(bs.delete_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as deleteDt, stf.stf_nm as calWrtNm from calendar cal left join staff stf on cal.cal_stf_no = stf.stf_no where cal.delete_dt is null
and cal.cal_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select cal.cal_no as calNo, cal.cal_nm as calNm, cal.cal_content as calContent, cal.cal_start as calStart, cal.cal_end as calEnd, cal.cal_stf_no as calStfNo, DATE_FORMAT(bs.create_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as createDt, DATE_FORMAT(bs.update_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as updateDt, DATE_FORMAT(bs.delete_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as deleteDt, stf.stf_nm as calWrtNm from calendar cal left join staff stf on cal.cal_stf_no = stf.stf_no where cal.delete_dt is null and cal.cal_no = {#calNo}
